amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that Congress should not delay enactment of critical appropriations necessary to ensure the well-being of the men and women of the United States Armed Forces fighting in Iraq and elsewhere around the world, by attempting to conduct a debate about immigration reform while the supplemental appropriations bill is pending on the floor of the United States Senate.

action.text: Amendment SA 372 proposed by Senator Cornyn.

vote.text: Amendment SA 372 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 38. Record Vote Number: 94.
